original_text: I know your deeds. See, I have placed before you an open door that no one can shut. I know that you have little strength, yet you have kept my word and have not denied my name.
korean_text: 볼지어다 내가 네 앞에 열린 문을 두었으되 능히 닫을 사람이 없으리라 내가 네 행위를 아노니 네가 작은 능력을 가지고서도 내 말을 지키며 내 이름을 배반하지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: See, I have placed before you an open door
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 내가 너 앞에 열린 문을 두었노라

sentences.original_text: I know that you have little strength
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네가 작은 힘을 가졌음을 아노라

sentences.original_text: yet you have kept my word
and have not denied my name
